verses.name: 1 Kings 3:18
verses.text: And it came to pass the third day after that I was delivered, that this woman was delivered also: and we were together; there was no stranger with us in the house, save we two in the house.

verses.name: 1 Kings 3:19
verses.text: And this woman’s child died in the night; because she overlaid it.

verses.name: 1 Kings 3:20
verses.text: And she arose at midnight, and took my son from beside me, while thine handmaid slept, and laid it in her bosom, and laid her dead child in my bosom.
